bottle import Bottle, static_file, request, run, template app = Bottle() # OUR HOMEPAGE @app.route('/') def index(): return open('website/index.html').read() # OUR STATIC FILES @app.route('/css/') def server_static(filename): print('CSS Served') return static_file(filename, root='website/css') @app.route('/js/' def server_static(filename): print('JS Served') return static_file(filename, root='website/js') @app.route('/js/') def server_static(filename): print('JS Served') return static_file(filename, root='website/js') #RUNNING OUR SERVER print('Serving on http://localhost:8080') run(app, host='localhost', port=808
